title: 92/280/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 May 1992 concerning the importation by Member States of fresh meat from Nicaragua
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 8 May 1992  concerning the importation by Member States of fresh meat from Nicaragua  (92/280/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall not authorize the importation of fresh meat from Nicaragua.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 May 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 356, 24. 12. 1991, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 146, 14. 6. 1979, p. 15. (4) OJ No L 124, 9. 5. 1992, p. 42.
